title: Interpretation of a dream about wet dates in a dream

preview.html: The interpretation of seeing dates in a dream is a promising vision, which foretells abundant sustenance, and is very good. The dream of dates has many important connotations and varies according to the details of the dreamer’s dream. You may also be interested in learning how to eat eggplant in a dream. Sometimes the vision indicates fear and anxiety, so we present to you the interpretation of this dream. In a dream by Ibn Sirin and al-Nabulsi, so follow us. You may also be interested in the following: Seeing a promise in a dreamInterpretation of seeing dates in a dream by Ibn Sirin and al-NabulsiIbn Sirin and al-Nabulsi explained that seeing dates in a dream means that money will be acquired in a way that does not anger God, and this also indicates the longevity of the dreamer If the dreamer saw that he was picking dates from the palm trees in his dream, this means that he will reconcile with someone he has been quarreling with for a while. If an unmarried woman sees dates, this indicates that she will not continue doing anything, and the wife’s seeing dates symbolizes the ease of life. Interpretation of seeing wet dates in a dreamInterpretation of a dream about eating wet datesEating dates indicate recovery, whether from illness or from some pain. If the dreamer sees himself picking dates from a palm tree and eating them, this means that he will soon obtain a large inheritance. To dream of eating dates at home means the beginning of A new and beneficial partnership, and eating fresh dates in a dream indicates a prosperous and spacious life. Eating dates in a dream indicates beautiful things, all of which are beneficial to the dreamer, including the fulfillment of the dreamer’s desires or a quick recovery from illness. And if the dreamer sees that he is drowning while eating dates This indicates that it is work without pay and benefit. Eating spoiled dates indicates an illicit source of money. To dream of a poor person eating dates means that God will give him a lot of money. This vision of a prisoner indicates that he will be released from prison in the near future. You may be interested B: Seeing house and room furniture in a dream. Interpretation of seeing wet dates in a man’s dream. If a person sees rotten dates in his dream, this means that he is sick with a serious illness or that he has committed a sin or will commit sins. But if a person sees in a dream that he is receiving dates from someone he trusts and from someone Familiar, then this is a sign of the blessing that he will receive in his money and that this money is legitimate. You may be interested: Crying and oppression in a dream. Interpretation of the appearance of dates for a married woman. If a married woman sees red dates, this indicates that God will grant her good offspring, and this is also the color of her stability and happiness with her husband and that she It will be hassle and problem free. Which is feared to happen. If a married woman sees that she is buying dates, this means that God will provide her and her husband with halal money in a short time, and this dream is good news for her, God willing. If a married woman sees that she is stealing dates in a dream, this means that she is talking about others in a way It does not please her and people’s symptoms deepen. This vision indicates that in this case it is a warning for her to stay away from what she is doing. As for a married woman seeing yellow dates in a dream, this indicates that God will bless her with repeated pregnancies and give her large and good offspring. You may be interested in:

title: Interpretation of a dream about visiting the dead at home

preview.html: The dream also indicates that there is healing, getting rid of diseases, staying away from problems and how to solve them in a short time, and it shows great joy and happiness, God willing. Interpretation of seeing the dead visiting the house in a dream for a single girl. If the unmarried girl who dreamed saw in a dream that the deceased was visiting her In her home and she was happy in the dream. The meaning indicates the achievement of many goals that this lonely girl wants and dreams of in her life. But after the unmarried woman saw the dead visiting them in her home, she sat with him for a long time. Here it indicates the abundance of food and goodness that will come to her God willing, it will make her very happy. And if an unmarried girl sees in a dream that the deceased visits her house in a dream. It appears that there are good things that will happen to the single woman in a dream during this time, God willing. The only girl who looks at the dead is that she enters their house with a lot of food. It indicates Her recovery from the ills she suffered in this period of her life, and God is the Most High. See also: Interpretation of a dream about the dead kissing the living. Interpretation of seeing the dead visiting the house in a dream for a married woman. If the married woman sees in a dream that the deceased was visiting her house and rejoicing in his presence. Here is an indication of achieving things. Many dreams and desires of her in her life, and God is Most High. Either the married woman who sees many dead people will visit her at home. This is an indication of the abundance of food and many good things that this married woman will get in her life, God willing. And if the married woman sees You enter a dead person’s house and give him money. Here, this married woman obtains sustenance, happiness, kindness, and peace of mind in her life, and God is Most High and All-Knowing. Either she is married and rejoices in front of a dead person and visits her house in a dream. This is an indication that she has been freed from all the major problems and fears that she is experiencing during her life. This period of her life. Interpretation of seeing the dead person visiting the house in a dream for a divorced woman. If the divorced woman sees that the deceased was trying to enter her house but was unable. This divorced woman must approach God Almighty and ask Him for forgiveness a lot in her daily life. The same applies to the divorced woman who in a dream looks at the dead person and he visits her and he is happy. This is a sign of good and happy news, and this divorced woman will be happy in her life, God willing. The dreaming divorced woman in the dream is looking for the dead person to visit her. Here it indicates that she is suffering from some of the things that plague her at this time in her life. And seeing the divorced woman in a dream is to see Her deceased relative is happy, and she visits her in a dream. She announces the good deeds that God Almighty will accept in this period of her life. Read also: Interpretation of a dream of giving banknotes to a dead person. Interpretation of seeing a dead person visiting the house in a man’s dream and its meaning. The dreamer who sees in a dream that he is looking at the deceased while visiting him in The dream. Here is an indication of the abundance of goodness and food that will come to him in his life, God willing. And if the dreamer is searching for the location of the deceased to ask to visit him in the dream. Here it indicates that the dreamer

title: Interpretation of a dream about walking on a frozen sea

preview.html: Interpretation of a dream about walking on a frozen sea in a dream When searching for an interpretation of a dream about walking on a frozen sea in a dream, there are a large number of dream indicators and interpretations. Interpretation of a dream about walking on a frozen sea in a dream. If one sees that he is walking on a frozen sea in a dream, this may be a sign of excessive thinking that the dreamer is suffering from those days. If one sees that he is walking on a sea of ​​ice, this may be a sign. On his patience due to the suffering he was experiencing at that time. Freezing water in a dream and walking on it could be a sign that the problems and fears of the dreamer’s life will end in those days. We may find that seeing walking on a frozen sea in a dream may indicate getting close to God Almighty. And getting rid of the sins and disobedience that the dreamer committed in the past days, thanks to God. Interpretation of a dream about walking on the bones of the dead in a dream. Whoever sees in his dream that he was walking on the bones of the dead, it could be a sign that some difficulties will face the dreamer and he must ask for God’s help. In the case of my personal opinion that he was walking on the bones of the dead, this may indicate Lack of money that the dreamer may suffer at that time. If one saw that he was walking on the bones of dead people, this may indicate the emotional emptiness that the dreamer is suffering from in those days. A person dreaming that he was walking on dead bones may indicate forbidden gains and the dreamer must He repents and makes sure of the sources of his money, and God knows best. Interpretation of a dream about walking on one leg in a dream: In the event that a person sees that he is walking on one leg in a dream, this may indicate what comes after the major stumbles that occurred in his life during that period. Seeing yourself walking on one leg One in a dream may indicate a lack of money or financial loss. Seeing him walking on one leg in a dream indicates a crisis that the dreamer is going through during this time, and God knows best. Interpretation of a dream of not being able to walk in a dream If one sees that he cannot walk, it may be that An indication of his inability to express himself. Seeing that a person cannot walk could be a sign that he is making some mistakes in an ongoing way. Seeing that a person is unable to walk in a dream may indicate difficulties that the dreamer faces in his life during this period. Whoever saw In his dream that he cannot walk, it may be a sign that he has committed some sins and he must repent and return to God the Most High and Blessed. Interpretation of a dream about walking on a snake in a dream In the event that someone sees himself walking on a snake, it may be a sign that you are overcoming On some serious difficulties in your life. A dream of a person walking on a snake in a dream can be a sign that positive things are happening in our lives these days. Whoever sees in his dream that he was walking on a snake in the dream, this could be a sign that he will defeat enemies and get rid of Same. If a person saw that he was walking on a snake in a dream, this may be a sign that he overcame some of the adversities he was exposed to or financial crises, thanks to God. Interpretation of a dream

title: Interpretation of a dream about climbing a high place in a dream

preview.html: Interpretation of dreams of climbing a high place in a dream in interpretations, but by diligent scholars who seek to interpret dreams. Interpretation of a dream of climbing a high place in a dream: Anyone who sees in a dream that he was able to climb to a very high place, could be a sign of the fulfillment of desires and dreams. It may Dreaming of climbing a high place in a dream is a sign of the effort and effort that the dreamer is making to achieve his ambitions. In the event that one sees himself climbing high in a dream, this may indicate that he will get what he wants during this period. Seeing that a person has climbed to a high place may It indicates the abundance of goodness and the enormous livelihood that the dreamer will receive during this time, and God knows best. Interpretation of a dream about climbing the stairs of the mosque in a dream: Climbing the stairs of the mosque in a dream may indicate some difficulties that the dreamer faces in his life during those days. Whoever dreams that he is climbing the stairs may indicate That there are some obstacles in his life that stand in the way of his dreams. Seeing yourself climbing the stairs of the mosque in a dream may indicate that you are moving away from God, Blessed and Most High, and need to repent and return to God, Blessed and Most High. Dreaming of climbing the tower of the mosque in a dream may be a sign of... Bad changes occur in his life during this period, and God knows best. Interpretation of a dream about climbing an elevator in a dream: If someone sees himself ascending the elevator, this may indicate good changes occurring in his life during this time. A person’s dream that he was climbing the elevator may indicate ease and comfort. Which he enjoys at that time. Seeing climbing the escalator in a dream may indicate that goals and ambitions will be achieved easily during this period. Seeing the elevator going up in a dream may indicate happy events that will come to him during this time, and God knows best. Interpretation of the dream of climbing the stairs In a dream: Climbing the stairs in a dream may mean achieving goals and ambitions during this time, and God knows best. Dreaming of climbing the stairs of an airplane in a dream may indicate closeness to God Almighty, and avoiding sins and disobedience. In the event that someone saw that he was climbing the stairs of an airplane, this may indicate To positive changes that occur in his life during those days. Dreaming of climbing the stairs in a dream can indicate joyful changes and control over difficult life circumstances, thanks to God. Interpretation of a dream of climbing stairs with difficulty in a dream: Climbing the stairs with difficulty may indicate the dreamer’s suffering in his life during those days. It can For anyone who dreams of climbing the stairs with difficulty, this indicates a difficulty that the dreamer may suffer from during those days. Anyone who sees in his dream that he is climbing the stairs with difficulty may indicate the intense pain and sadness that the dreamer will face during that period. When one sees that he was climbing the stairs with difficulty, he may This indicates the severity and lightness of time that the dreamer is experiencing in those days, and God knows best. Interpretation of a dream about climbing an iceberg in a dream If someone saw that he was climbing an iceberg, this may indicate the dreamer’s good fortune. A dream about climbing an iceberg may indicate happy events What happens to the dreamer at that time

title: Interpretation of seeing drinking alcohol in a dream or seeing it and not drinking it?

preview.html: Wine in a dreamDrinking wine in a dream can be troublesome, especially for people known for their faith and piety and who stay away from drinking it in this world, wanting to carry out the commands of God (Glory be to Him). .. It has other meanings that differ from reality. What is the interpretation of a dream about drinking alcohol? There are many opinions about this dream, and we find that it expresses a lack of religion and distance from the teachings of Islam and the pursuit of sins and transgressions at times, and it expresses cooperation and integration with a partner at other times, so let us get to know each. The sayings that came to interpret this dream. It is said that whoever is seen drinking alcohol out of greed, far from his society and prefers isolation after being rejected therein because of the actions he performs that are contrary to public morals, which made people hate him and describe him. As befits him. But if this is the first time he swallows it and he already has good morals, then his vision indicates that he may face a big problem in his life and is looking for someone to help him find a solution, but unfortunately he finds that everyone is busy with his personal life and there is no one A helping hand supports him, even with advice. If the fortuneteller sits with a woman he does not know, talks to her, and appears drunk, then he will get married soon, and he will be very understanding with his wife, so as not to reject her request, and never do anything. Make her angry with him. Some scholars have mentioned in the interpretation of this dream that if the dreamer is a business owner and drinks excessively in his dream, then there are some suspicious deals that he enters into that bring him a lot of forbidden money, which may cause his future. He spoils his business and loses what he has gained in terms of legitimacy, so he must stay away from the forbidden path, and engage in Sharia, so that God will give him goodness and Sharia. One of the positive indicators that the vision can bring is that if the dreamer suffers from a certain disease and does not find a cure for it from doctors until he feels despair, This dream expresses the approaching recovery, and the patient knows that healing is in the hands of God only, and that medicines and doctors are only reasons for taking it, but at the same time we do not believe that they are the ones who have the ability to heal. It could also indicate making an agreement with a sincere man and agreeing to A partnership with him, and this partnership will bring more money that they are trying to collect through legal means. The dreamer, if his mood is bad in reality, his behavior is getting worse and other friends may come into his life who learn from him what he is doing against the law and religion, so he bears the burden of others. What Is the interpretation of drinking alcohol in a dream by Ibn Sirin? Ibn Sirin’s sayings about this fever differed depending on the details contained in it, as well as according to the psychological state of the pioneer and his morals, which he is actually distinguished by. If she sees a married woman trying to support her family and forgetting her rights in the midst of life’s battles, she offers to provide for her children and family. And she saw that she was drinking alcohol in her dream, then this is considered an indication that there are some things that are hidden from her and the husband may be in an illicit relationship with another woman without the dreamer’s knowledge. He also said that seeing him drinking can express recovery from diseases, if he sees that he

title: Interpretation of a dream about an intimate relationship for a single woman with someone I do not know

preview.html: Interpretation of a dream about an intimate relationship for a single woman with a person I do not knowThe interpretation of dreams about a close relationship with a person I do not know is sought by many girls who have not been married before, and this vision is considered one of the strange, confusing and disturbing visions for girls. Interpretation of a dream about intercourse for a single woman by Ibn Sirin Translators and scholars differed in the interpretation Dreaming of establishing a close relationship with someone I do not know, and Ibn Sirin’s interpretation is one of the most important of these interpretations, and we will present it through a different interpretation. Website where: Ibn Sirin says: If an unmarried girl sees in her dream that she is having intercourse with a man she does not know, this indicates that this girl has committed many sins and disobedience, but she has repented and repented to God. Also, the interpretation of dreams is for a close relationship for single people with a person I do not know It suggests that the girl will collect money, achieve success, and achieve her ambitions. If an unmarried girl sees in her dream that she is associated with eggs, this means that good things will come to her and that she will live a life full of happiness and comfort in the coming period. But if the man who had sex with a girl in a dream is black This is a sign of the stability of her family life in the coming days. Read also: Interpretation of seeing the deceased changing the furniture in his house in a dream. Another interpretation of a dream about sexual intercourse for a single woman with a stranger. Interpretation of dreams about a single intimate relationship with someone I do not know indicates that the girl faces many problems and crises in her life. If an unmarried girl sees in her dream that she is having sex with a strange man, this means that she will suffer from severe distress in the coming days. This vision also shows that the girl is going through a lot of big problems at the present time. If an engaged girl sees that she has had sexual intercourse with her fiancé in In a dream, this indicates that her wedding is approaching. Also, the interpretation of a dream about an unmarried woman’s close relationship with someone she does not know indicates the girl’s desire for normalization and is characterized by the characteristics of this person who deals with her sexually. If an unmarried girl sees in her dream that she is having sex with a stranger She does not know him, it means that this girl is far from her routine life and her love of learning about different cultures. This vision is also considered a warning for the girl to think well and carefully before starting any new project she wants to do, and also if marriage is of interest to her, she should be careful in her decision When an unmarried girl sees in her dream that she is having sexual intercourse with someone she does not know, this indicates that the girl feels uncomfortable and as if she is limited in her life. This vision also shows that the single girl makes quick decisions without thinking carefully, which will lead her to regret those decisions. If an unmarried girl sees in her dream that she is having sex with her husband while in reality she is not married, this is a sign of her acquaintance with a new young man who will soon become her husband. Interpretation of a dream about intercourse for a single woman with someone she knows. After talking about the interpretation of a dream about a person having an intimate relationship with someone I do not know, We will show you the interpretation of a dream about sexual intercourse for a single woman with someone she knows: when

title: Interpretation of the vision of giving birth to a son for married and unmarried women

preview.html: Through our article today, we will present to you the interpretation of the vision of giving birth to a son for married and unmarried women. According to Ibn Sirin, it is worth noting that the interpretation of a dream about childbirth varies according to the type of child, whether male or female, and varies according to the dreamer. Through the following lines in the encyclopedia, we will show you the meanings of a dream about giving birth to a son to a married woman. Interpretation of seeing a married woman giving birth to a son. There are many commentators who discussed the interpretation of seeing a married woman giving birth to a son. We will explain some of these interpretations to you as follows: Seeing a married woman giving birth to a child indicates that God will give her a child soon. The dream of a married woman who has not yet carried her daughter indicates that she will soon give birth to a child similar to the child she saw in her dream, so this vision is considered one of The most promising visions. If a married woman sees in her dream that she has given birth to a boy, this means that she will get rid of the problems she faces. The dream of a married woman who gives birth to a boy and is happy with him indicates that this girl will obtain a lot of livelihood and will overcome the problems she faces. From dreams It is unpleasant for a married woman to see herself giving birth to a male child and then this child dies. This vision may indicate that this woman is barren. If a married woman sees in her dream that she has given birth to a strange-looking man, this means that she is about to take a new step in her life and that she is afraid This step. One of the most promising visions is to see a married woman who has never given birth herself giving birth to a male child. This is good news that God will give birth to her soon and most likely her child will be female. As we mentioned previously, seeing a male in a dream means giving birth to a female and vice versa. Interpretation of a dream about giving birth to a handsome boy: Seeing a pregnant woman giving birth to a handsome male indicates that she will give birth to a female, and that this little girl will be fair to her. If a pregnant woman sees in her dream that her birth is difficult, This means that she thinks a lot about childbirth, and that she has some fears. Interpretation of a dream about the birth and death of a male child. If a married woman sees herself giving birth to a male child, God will die, this means that she will face some problems during pregnancy. Seeing the birth and death of a male child may indicate the imminent death of the dreamer’s relative. And God knows best. Interpretation of a dream about my friend giving birth to a boy. If a married woman sees in her dream that a friend of hers has given birth to a boy, and this friend is single, then this is good news about the approaching date of her friend’s wedding. But if a married woman dreams that her friend is giving birth to a boy and her friend gets married, this indicates that That girl will face some difficulties in her coming days. Interpretation of a dream about my sister giving birth to a son. If a girl dreams that her married sister is giving birth, this means that she will soon give birth to a child. A girl seeing her sister giving birth to a male child indicates the arrival of kindness and livelihood to her sister. If she is suffering from problems that she will soon get rid of So, we have reached the end of our article today, in which we presented to you the different interpretations of seeing a baby boy in a dream. We hope that you will like the article, and thank you for your generous follow-up with us and today.

title: Interpretation of a dream about a husband beating his wife in a dream according to Ibn Sirin

preview.html: Interpretation of a dream about a husband hitting his wife in a dream: Beating is one of the barbaric methods that some men deal with their wives because of the psychological and physical pain it causes. Interpretation of a dream about a husband hitting his wife in a dream can indicate negative feelings or express a period of anxiety, but with regard to the severity of the question it can indicate Bliss, happiness and love, but how and when? What is the interpretation of a dream about a husband beating his wife in a dream? The interpretation of seeing a husband hitting his wife Often, it indicates this woman’s feeling of fear and instability with her husband and the desire for security. Beating in real life is a means of oppression and injustice to which she is exposed She has a human being, so in the dream, it expresses his exposure to the control of an authority that causes him a lot of psychological and physical pain. She also expressed her feeling that there is a strange personality controlling her husband’s mind and making him do things that she did not prepare him for. It also indicates that she feels very afraid about her husband’s actions, perhaps towards her. Or towards everyone around them. But we also do not forget that beating is originally a means of punishment, although it is hated, but it remains so, so it can be an indication that the wife has committed a shameful or very bad act, which may conflict with the public. Morals and ethics. Perhaps this vision is an indicator of the end of her relationship with her husband, because they feel the end of their feelings and the growing indifference and hatred between them. It can also express the woman’s feeling of anxiety that her husband knows of her deception and betrayal of him, so the time of reckoning is approaching. Most interpreters agree that the interpretation of this The vision can indicate different meanings, depending on the method of beating and the way it is done, as well as the place and the people who are watching the beating. If she is among the people in the streets, it usually means that they will be separated forever, and that she will leave the husband’s house with a big scandal that will be watched by the neighbors and those who around them. But if he is one of their children, then this indicates that the father is an evil and cruel person who causes a lot of harm and trouble to his family. But if he beats her in front of some of her family, then this indicates that she has committed a major sin that will disappoint her family and her family and make her ugly to everyone. What is the interpretation of a dream about a husband? By beating his wife, Ibn Shirin? In interpreting this vision, Ibn Sirin goes to many connotations that depend on the part of the beating that the husband hits, the circumstances surrounding the beating, its causes, and the method of beating. She says that the husband who accidentally slaps his face is a sign of her husband’s misbehavior and that he is famous for it in the world. As for those who If he hits his wife right, it means that she will get a good job or that her house will have a new source of income, which will be the reason for a more prosperous and prosperous future life. But if he hits her on the forehead or on the head, this is evidence that she is a sensible, cultured, and intelligent person and that he is proud of her. Among people. But if he hits her in the stomach, this is a sign that she will get pregnant soon, but it will be a difficult birth for her because of her physical weakness. What is its importance? Did a husband hit his wife in a dream for a married woman? Many opinions agree that this vision indicates that many things
